```pddl
[
  '(:action make ; Make a connection or assignment to update the state
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?target) (not (made ?target)))
    :effect (made ?target)
  )',
  
  '(:action find ; Find an entity and update its visibility status
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?entity) (not (visible ?entity)))
    :effect (visible ?entity)
  )',
  
  '(:action check
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (checked ?agent ?entity)))
    :effect (checked ?agent ?entity)
  )',
  
  '(:action talk
    :parameters (?p - agent ?mic - microphone ?voice - voice ?advice - advice ?panel - panel)
    :precondition (and 
        (or (not (connected ?mic)) ; Microphone is not connected
            (and (connected ?mic) ; Microphone is connected, player at microphone, and voice not heard
                 (at ?p ?mic) 
                 (not (heard ?voice))))
        (or (not (visible ?panel)) ; Panel is not visible
            (and (visible ?panel) ; Panel is visible and not selected
                 (not (selected ?panel))))
        (or (not (efficient ?voice)) ; Voice is not efficient
            (and (efficient ?voice) ; Voice is efficient and advice not given
                 (not (given ?advice))))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (connected ?mic) ; Microphone becomes connected
        (visible ?panel) ; Panel becomes visible
        (selected ?panel) ; Panel becomes selected
        (heard ?voice) ; Voice becomes heard
        (efficient ?voice) ; Voice becomes efficient
        (given ?advice) ; Advice becomes given
    )
  )',
  
  '(:action use ; Use a resource to achieve a task
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (used ?agent ?resource)))
    :effect (used ?agent ?resource)
  )'
]
```
